  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>1926</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Øret</string>
            <string language="en">The Ear</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Ohr</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Oreille</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Orelha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Orecchio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το αυτί</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Oído</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Se hvordan øret er bygget opp. Hva skjer når man hører f.eks. musikk?</string>
            <string language="en">Learn about the ear anatomy. What happens when you listen to music?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">øret</string>
            <string language="en">the ear</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erlernen Sie über die Ohranatomie. Was 
geschieht, wenn Sie Musik hören?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Renseignez-vous sur l'anatomie d'oreille. 
Que se produit quand vous écoutez la musique ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aprenda sobre o anatomy da orelha. Que 
acontece quando você escuta a música?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Impari circa l'anatomia dell'orecchio. Che 
cosa accade quando ascoltate musica?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάθετε για την ανατομία αυτιών. Αυτό που 
συμβαίνει πότε ακούτε τη μουσική;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aprenda sobre la anatomía del oído. ¿Qué 
sucede cuando usted escucha la música?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">das Ohr</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'oreille</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a orelha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">l'orecchio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">το αυτί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el oído</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
